Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_BIOHOJAC WHERE IND_DEL= :IND_DEL ORDER BY PERICODI DESC
INSERT INTO CAM_BIOHOJAC ( BIOHOJACCODI, PROYCODI, FECPUESTAOPE, USU_CREACION, IND_DEL, FEC_CREACION ) VALUES ( :BIOHOJACCODI, :PROYCODI, :FECPUESTAOPE, :USU_CREACION, :IND_DEL, :FEC_CREACION )
UPDATE CAM_BIOHOJAC SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, FECPUESTAOPE = :FECPUESTAOPE, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, WHERE BIOHOJACCODI = :BIOHOJACCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_BIOHOJAC ORDER BY BIOHOJACCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_BIOHOJAC SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL='0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_BIOHOJAC WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
